body_html:
Where are these being deallocated? Is there a missing:

delete[] lengths;
delete[] strings;

in this function?

Better still, use std::unique_ptr as is used in other places in this file to avoid worrying about manual deletes (e.g., see definition of DEFINE_SET_ATTR_LIST), so this would change to:

std::unique_ptr<size_t[]> lengths(new size_t[num_strings]);
std::unique_ptr<jbyte*[]> strings(new jbyte*[num_string]));
